page_not_found: The page you are looking for does not exist.

footer.tagline: Fresh food directly from farmers to your city.
footer.responseTime: We reply within one business day.

homePage.alertMessage: This is only a test version; no orders will be delivered.
homePage.heroDescription: Plan your shopping ahead, support local growers, and get fresh food without waste.
homePage.sideTitle: From the field to your door
homePage.sideDescription: Pick up at the market or a pick-up point. Fresh, without middlemen.
homePage.sideTip1: Bring your own containers‚Äîfarmers will gladly help pack.
homePage.sideTip2: Check the labels at stalls to see the farmer's name and growing approach.
homePage.sideTip3: Preorders help farms bring exactly as much as will be used.
homePage.eventsDescription: Selected events where you can meet our farmers in person.
homePage.productsTitle: Popular products people reserve most often
homePage.productsDescription: A seasonal selection that changes with what's fresh.
homePage.aboutDescription: We want local food to be an accessible choice for every household. Preorders help farmers plan harvests, cut waste, and give you transparent origin.
homePage.aboutPoint1: Farmers see real demand in advance and can plan harvests better.
homePage.aboutPoint2: Customers get fresh food with fewer packages.
homePage.aboutPoint3: Communities connect towns with nearby farms and save resources.
homePage.aboutHelper: We connect farms, markets, and community pick-up points
homePage.aboutHelperHeadline: One calendar, one cart, local support
homePage.aboutHelperBody: We're building a space where honest production meets people who value it. Discover new farmers, create a preorder, and pick it up exactly when it suits you.

loginPage.title: Login
loginPage.subtitle: Enter your login credentials

loginPage.benefit_support: Support ready to help if you need it

registerPage.title: Registration
registerPage.subtitle: Create your account
registerPage.role_step_description: Start by choosing how you'll use Farmly.
registerPage.role_customer_desc: Shop directly from local farmers and track your orders.
registerPage.role_farmer_desc: Showcase your harvest, manage farms, and handle preorders.
registerPage.details_description: Share contact info so we can connect you with farmers.
registerPage.hero_description: Connect with local farms‚Äîwhether you want to shop fresh food or offer your own harvest.
registerPage.highlight_shop_desc: Order directly from vetted farmers with no middlemen.
registerPage.highlight_grow_desc: Add your farms, list products, and keep orders organized.
registerPage.highlight_trust_desc: Verified profiles and clear communication for both customers and farmers.
